verses.verse: In the <S%H6240>seventeenth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H6492>Pekah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7425>Remaliah<s%> <S%H271>Ahaz<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3147>Jotham<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> began to <S%H4427>reign.<s%>

<S%H6242>Twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> was <S%H271>Ahaz<s%> when he began to <S%H4427>reign;<s%> and he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H8337>sixteen<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem:<s%> and he <S%H6213>didn't<s%> do that which was <S%H3477>right<s%> in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> his <S%H430>God,<s%> like <S%H1732>David<s%> his <S%H1>father.<s%>

But he <S%H3212>walked<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H1121>yes,<s%> and made his son to pass <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H784>fire,<s%> according to the <S%H8441>abominations<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> whom <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> cast <S%H3423>out<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
He <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> and burnt <S%H6999>incense<s%> in the high <S%H1116>places,<s%> and on the <S%H1389>hills,<s%> and under every <S%H7488>green<s%> <S%H6086>tree.<s%>

Then <S%H7526>Rezin<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H758>Syria<s%> and <S%H6492>Pekah<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7425>Remaliah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> to <S%H4421>war:<s%> and they <S%H6696>besieged<s%> <S%H271>Ahaz,<s%> but <S%H3201>could<s%> not overcome <S%H3898>him.<s%>

At that <S%H6256>time<s%> <S%H7526>Rezin<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H758>Syria<s%> <S%H7725>recovered<s%> <S%H359>Elath<s%> to <S%H758>Syria,<s%> and <S%H5394>drove<s%> the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> from <S%H359>Elath;<s%> and the <S%H726>Syrians<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H359>Elath,<s%> and <S%H3427>lived<s%> <S%H3117>there,<s%> to this day.

So <S%H271>Ahaz<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> to Tiglath <S%H8407>Pileser<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "I am your <S%H5650>servant<s%> and your <S%H1121>son.<s%> Come <S%H5927>up,<s%> and <S%H3467>save<s%> me out of the <S%H3709>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H758>Syria,<s%> and out of the <S%H3709>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> who rise up against <S%H6965>me.<s%>"

<S%H271>Ahaz<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H2091>gold<s%> that was <S%H4672>found<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and in the <S%H214>treasures<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H7971>sent<s%> it for a <S%H7810>present<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria.<s%>

The <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%> <S%H8085>listened<s%> to <S%H4428>him;<s%> and the king of <S%H804>Assyria<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> against <S%H1834>Damascus,<s%> and <S%H8610>took<s%> <S%H1540>it,<s%> and carried its people captive to <S%H7024>Kir,<s%> and <S%H4191>killed<s%> <S%H7526>Rezin.<s%>

<S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H271>Ahaz<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H1834>Damascus<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> Tiglath <S%H8407>Pileser<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria,<s%> and <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> that was at <S%H1834>Damascus;<s%> and <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H271>Ahaz<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H223>Urijah<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> the <S%H1823>fashion<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and its <S%H8403>pattern,<s%> according to all its <S%H4639>workmanship.<s%>

<S%H223>Urijah<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> an <S%H4196>altar:<s%> according to all that <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H271>Ahaz<s%> had <S%H7971>sent<s%> from <S%H1834>Damascus,<s%> so <S%H223>Urijah<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> it for the <S%H935>coming<s%> of <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H271>Ahaz<s%> from <S%H1834>Damascus.<s%>

When the <S%H4428>king<s%> had <S%H935>come<s%> from <S%H1834>Damascus,<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H4196>altar:<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%> drew <S%H7126>near<s%> to the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and offered on <S%H5927>it.<s%>

He <S%H6999>burnt<s%> his burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> and his meal <S%H4503>offering,<s%> and <S%H5258>poured<s%> his drink <S%H5262>offering,<s%> and <S%H2236>sprinkled<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of his peace <S%H8002>offerings,<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

The <S%H5178>bronze<s%> <S%H4196>altar,<s%> which was <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> he <S%H7126>brought<s%> from the <S%H6440>forefront<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> from between his <S%H4196>altar<s%> and the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> it on the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H3409>side<s%> of his <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

<S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H271>Ahaz<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H223>Urijah<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "On the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H6999>burn<s%> the <S%H1242>morning<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> and the <S%H6153>evening<s%> meal <S%H4503>offering,<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> and his meal <S%H4503>offering,<s%> with the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> of all the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> and their meal <S%H4503>offering,<s%> and their drink <S%H5262>offerings;<s%> and <S%H2236>sprinkle<s%> on it all the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> and all the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H2077>sacrifice;<s%> but the <S%H5178>bronze<s%> <S%H4196>altar<s%> shall be for me to inquire <S%H1239>by.<s%>"
<S%H223>Urijah<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H4428>so,<s%> according to all that king <S%H271>Ahaz<s%> <S%H6680>commanded.<s%>

<S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H271>Ahaz<s%> cut <S%H7112>off<s%> the <S%H4526>panels<s%> of the <S%H4350>bases,<s%> and <S%H5493>removed<s%> the <S%H3595>basin<s%> from off <S%H3381>them,<s%> and took down the <S%H3220>sea<s%> from off the <S%H5178>bronze<s%> <S%H1241>oxen<s%> that were under <S%H5414>it,<s%> and put it on a <S%H4837>pavement<s%> of <S%H68>stone.<s%>

The <S%H4329>covered<s%> way for the <S%H7676>Sabbath<s%> that they had <S%H1129>built<s%> in the <S%H1004>house,<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H3996>entry<s%> <S%H2435>outside,<s%> <S%H5437>turned<s%> he to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria.<s%>

Now the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H1697>acts<s%> of <S%H271>Ahaz<s%> which he <S%H6213>did,<s%> <S%H3789>aren't<s%> they written in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H1697>chronicles<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah?<s%>

<S%H271>Ahaz<s%> <S%H7901>slept<s%> with his <S%H1>fathers,<s%> and was <S%H6912>buried<s%> with his <S%H1>fathers<s%> in the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David:<s%> and <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> reigned in his <S%H4427>place.<s%>
